title: The Voice of the people
creator_credit: Ian Allen, Rolf De Heer and AFTRS
brief_description: Dramatizes the powerful influence of the television media and argues that it has the ability to misrepresent the opinions of the community through editorial licence. A man’s comments are edited so severely on the evening news that his viewpoint is totally misrepresented and his reaction is shown.
